execute-query.query:
select distinct bib_mfhd.mfhd_id, bib_mfhd.bib_id, bib_master.update_date as bib_update, mfhd_master.update_date as mfhd_update from lmldb.mfhd_master, lmldb.bib_master, lmldb.bib_mfhd, lmldb.bib_index where bib_index.bib_id = bib_mfhd.bib_id and bib_master.bib_id = bib_mfhd.bib_id and mfhd_master.mfhd_id = bib_mfhd.mfhd_id and bib_index.index_code = '655H' and bib_index.normal_heading = 'INTERNET RESOURCE' and mfhd_master.location_id >= 69 and (mfhd_master.location_id <= 76 or mfhd_master.location_id = 92) and mfhd_master.suppress_in_opac != 'Y' and bib_master.suppress_in_opac != 'Y' and (
bib_master.bib_id =12 ) order by bib_mfhd.bib_id
